StringTable.Label: Quest_PrecursorArtifactCache_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain a charge for the artifact [HS=HS_InspireScientists]Inspire Scientists[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnigmaticMonolith_Pragmatism_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: +10% of [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] needed for current [HS=HS_ResearchCenter]Research Center[/HS] project.

StringTable.Label: Quest_AncientArtifact_Choice_2_Dec
StringTable.String: Store the artifact so that it can be used later to gain vision over a distant part of the galaxy.[BR]Gain a charge for the artifact [HS=HS_DistantVisionArtifact]Distant Vision[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Quest_ArtifactJoyOrResource_Equality_Bonus_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain a charge for the artifact [HS=HS_PlanetApprovalArtifact]Harmony Beacon[/HS].
